title: ObjectReleaseTracker silently 'releases' untracked objects
description: Proposing to log (at info or debug level) when the 'release' of an untracked object is attempted.

comments.content: Attached proposed patch with logging at info level on the basis that current usage mostly (but not exclusively) happens only if assertions are enabled. Happy to log at debug instead of info level if folks prefer that.
comments.author: Christine Poerschke
